question: The chart shows annual counts of cybersecurity incidents. Which statement is reliable according to the chart data?

options.A: 2011-12 has nearly four times as many incidents as 2010-11, as suggested by the bar size and color.
options.B: 2007-08 is the highest among all years shown.
options.C: 2006-07 has the fewest incidents among the years shown.

explanation: Dual encoding (bar height + width/color) exaggerates differences. Despite the strong visual emphasis on later years, the reliable conclusion is that 2006-07 is the lowest.
